doctor_utters: How may I help you today?
Do you have shortness of breath?
Do you have a productive cough with sputum?
Do you have chest pain or discomfort?
Do you have a history of smoking?
Do you have a history of exposure to tuberculosis or other infectious diseases?
Do you have a history of chronic lung disease?
Do you have a history of travel to an area with a high prevalence of tuberculosis?
patient_utters: Yes, I am experiencing shortness of breath or difficulty breathing in a significant way.
Yes, I have a fever (either felt or measured with a thermometer).
Yes, I have a cough that produces colored or more abundant sputum than usual.
Yes, I have pain somewhere related to my reason for consulting.
Yes, I have a chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD).
Yes, I have traveled out of the country to N in the last 4 weeks.
